channel.title: Arduino on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in Arduino on My blog

item.title: Talk: from light bulb to Arduino
item.description: I had opportunity to give a talk small talk about my work with Arduino on Commerce Factory – Nov 2014. Slides are available here: www.slideshare.net You can check video here

item.title: Arduino Clock TimeZones and something more
item.description:
Following with my last project – Arduino clock  – i wanted to extend it with 2 features:

  1. Handling daylight saving time,
  2. Showing up time in different time zone.
